column2: quite a few of the servings were not even of the ocean
column4: those were the tastiest and most memorable. I would accept that it's just "unconventional" if all the more traditional plates didn't suffer from a lack of originality
column5: freshness and excitement. Omakase dishes should complement one another but also each be a unique "dance" of flavors. We saw none of this
column6: so much as random plates being sent our way.
